Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The game server contains the main method. Acts as sort of controller between clients

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      No argument constructor used when the Server starts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkAnswer(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String answer)
      Check the answer From userName and check if both users have answered the question (gm.ifAllUserHasAnswered)
      java.lang.String getAllUser()
      Method to get all current clients (userNames) in the userList HashMap
      ServerHandle getTwoUser(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String sendToUser)
      Method used when a user wants to initiate a game with another user.
      ServerHandle getUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Return the Client object of the user that has the given userName
      void leavesGame(java.lang.String userName)
      If a user Leaves the game this method can send a message to the other user that was currently in a game with the leaving user.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Game servers main method that initiates the game by creating an instance of Server with no arguments
      void messageUserToUpdate()
      Method used to notify all clients to update their list of current users.
      void removeClient(java.lang.String userName)
      Method to remove a user from the UserList HashMap.
      void sendMessageToUser(ServerHandle user)
      Send request to user (sendToUser) reference updated in the getTwoUser method
      void start()
      Start method that initiates the ServerSocket and starts waiting for clients to connect.
      void StartGame(java.lang.String userOne, java.lang.String userTwo)
      Create a pairGame (Game) and Start a game when a pairGame is configured.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
        No argument constructor used when the Server starts

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Game servers main method that initiates the game by creating an instance of Server with no arguments
        Parameters:
        args - not implemented

      • start

        public void start()
        Start method that initiates the ServerSocket and starts waiting for clients to connect. For each client that connects it adds them to the userList and starts the ServerHandle

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(java.lang.String userName)
        Method to remove a user from the UserList HashMap.
        Parameters:
        userName - The userName of the client to remove

      • getAllUser

        public java.lang.String getAllUser()
        Method to get all current clients (userNames) in the userList HashMap
        Returns:
        String of all users userName separated by " "

      • messageUserToUpdate

        public void messageUserToUpdate()
        Method used to notify all clients to update their list of current users. Used when a new user connects or a users discconnects

      • getTwoUser

        public ServerHandle getTwoUser(java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String sendToUser)
        Method used when a user wants to initiate a game with another user. Takes String of userName and returns the actual client
        Parameters:
        userName - The userName of the user that initiates the game request
        sendToUser - The userName of the user that the request is for
        Returns:
        the ServerHandle object (Client) of the user that the request is directed for

      • sendMessageToUser

        public void sendMessageToUser(ServerHandle user)
        Send request to user (sendToUser) reference updated in the getTwoUser method
        Parameters:
        user -

      • getUser

        public ServerHandle getUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Return the Client object of the user that has the given userName
        Parameters:
        userName - The userName of the client to get
        Returns:
        the clients ServerHandle Object

      • StartGame

        public void StartGame(java.lang.String userOne,
                      java.lang.String userTwo)
        Create a pairGame (Game) and Start a game when a pairGame is configured. Add the game to the pairGameList
        Parameters:
        userOne - The first user userName
        userTwo - The secont user UserName

      • leavesGame

        public void leavesGame(java.lang.String userName)
        If a user Leaves the game this method can send a message to the other user that was currently in a game with the leaving user.
        Parameters:
        userName - of the user that has left

      • checkAnswer

        public void checkAnswer(java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String answer)
        Check the answer From userName and check if both users have answered the question (gm.ifAllUserHasAnswered)
        Parameters:
        userName - The user that has answered
        answer - The answer that the user has provided
